hook.text: What if a company had no CEO, no board, no headquarters â€” just code and community?

buildup.text: DAO stands for Decentralized Autonomous Organization. Members vote on every decision.

discovery.text: Hold the DAO's token? You get voting power. More tokens, more votes. Democracy meets ownership.

twist.text: DAOs control billions: buying rare art, funding startups, even trying to buy the US Constitution.

climax.text: But beware: 'The DAO' was hacked in 2016. $60 million stolen through a smart contract bug.

punchline.text: DAOs: the future of organizations, still learning from the past.

quiz.question: How do DAO members make decisions?
